title: Grateful Dead Live at Pauley Pavilion, UCLA on 1982-02-21
lineage: Master Cassettes (Nakamichi CR-7A)> Tascam DA-3000 (DSF 1-bit/5.6 MHz) > dBpoweramp 24/96 > Adobe Audition CC 2020 > TLH flac2496
source: Mark Severson's Master (FOB) Audience Cassettes; 3 x Nakamichi 700 cardioids (center mic 6db EQ), X/Y 85 degrees > Sony D5 (20' left of center, 35-40' from stage)
